snippet: Chelsea were given a stiff examination by Stoke City at Stamford Bridge on Saturday before extending their lead at the top of the Premier League to nine points ahead of the late game between Liverpool and Manchester City....

headline.main: Chelsea Extend Lead at the Top, United Leave It Late
headline.print_headline: Chelsea Extend Lead at the Top, United Leave It Late

lead_paragraph: Chelsea were given a stiff examination by Stoke City at Stamford Bridge on Saturday before extending their lead at the top of the Premier League to nine points ahead of the late game between Liverpool and Manchester City.

snippet: Manuel Pellegrini has urged caution ahead of Manchester City's final match of the season at Swansea City on Sunday after his team were handed a reprieve in the race to qualify for the Champions League....

headline.main: City Boss Pellegrini Urges Caution Ahead of Swansea Game
headline.print_headline: City Boss Pellegrini Urges Caution Ahead of Swansea Game

lead_paragraph: Manuel Pellegrini has urged caution ahead of Manchester City's final match of the season at Swansea City on Sunday after his team were handed a reprieve in the race to qualify for the Champions League.

snippet: Arsene Wenger failed to collect the one birthday present he really coveted as his Arsenal side missed a golden opportunity to open daylight on their rivals at the top of the Premier League on Saturday....

headline.main: Arsenal Top but Wenger Fails to Land the Present He Wanted
headline.print_headline: Arsenal Top but Wenger Fails to Land the Present He Wanted

lead_paragraph: Arsene Wenger failed to collect the one birthday present he really coveted as his Arsenal side missed a golden opportunity to open daylight on their rivals at the top of the Premier League on Saturday.

snippet: Saido Berahino's transfer wrangle has been keenly felt by West Bromwich Albion, according to manager Tony Pulis, who hopes the club will now benefit following an end to the "shenanigans" surrounding the striker's future....

headline.main: West Brom Manager Pulis Wants Berahino Boost
headline.print_headline: West Brom Manager Pulis Wants Berahino Boost

lead_paragraph: Saido Berahino's transfer wrangle has been keenly felt by West Bromwich Albion, according to manager Tony Pulis, who hopes the club will now benefit following an end to the "shenanigans" surrounding the striker's future.

snippet: The outcome of the referendum on constitutional reforms in Italy has prompted Premier Matteo Renzi to announce his resignation after 2 ½ years in office. Here is a look at the political landscape in Italy following the result....
lead_paragraph: The outcome of the referendum on constitutional reforms in Italy has prompted Premier Matteo Renzi to announce his resignation after 2 ½ years in office. Here is a look at the political landscape in Italy following the result.

snippet: Stoke City chairman Peter Coates has backed manager Mark Hughes to guide the Midlands team out of their current slump after Saturday's 3-0 drubbing at home to Everton left them without a win in four Premier League games....

headline.main: Stoke Chairman Coates Backs Under-Pressure Manager Hughes
headline.print_headline: Stoke Chairman Coates Backs Under-Pressure Manager Hughes

lead_paragraph: Stoke City chairman Peter Coates has backed manager Mark Hughes to guide the Midlands team out of their current slump after Saturday's 3-0 drubbing at home to Everton left them without a win in four Premier League games.

snippet: Manager Pep Guardiola is pleased with how well his Manchester City side have coped with their demanding schedule this season as they have managed to stay close to the Premier League summit despite their European commitments....

headline.main: Guardiola Pleased With Man City's Schedule Management
headline.print_headline: Guardiola Pleased With Man City's Schedule Management

lead_paragraph: Manager Pep Guardiola is pleased with how well his Manchester City side have coped with their demanding schedule this season as they have managed to stay close to the Premier League summit despite their European commitments.

snippet: Stoke City manager Mark Hughes hopes to end the year on a high as the side prepare for trips to the Premier League's top-two teams boosted by the return of winger Ibrahim Afellay....

headline.main: Stoke Hoping to Leave Top-Two Nursing Festive Hangovers
headline.print_headline: Stoke Hoping to Leave Top-Two Nursing Festive Hangovers

lead_paragraph: Stoke City manager Mark Hughes hopes to end the year on a high as the side prepare for trips to the Premier League's top-two teams boosted by the return of winger Ibrahim Afellay.

snippet: Pep Guardiola was hailed as the best thing to happen to English football when he swanned into Manchester City at the start of this season and immediately swept all before him with 10 cultured victories in a row....

headline.main: Guardiola Facing Searching Questions as City Slump
headline.print_headline: Guardiola Facing Searching Questions as City Slump

lead_paragraph: Pep Guardiola was hailed as the best thing to happen to English football when he swanned into Manchester City at the start of this season and immediately swept all before him with 10 cultured victories in a row.

snippet: Leicester City midfielder Nampalys Mendy will be out of action for around five weeks after undergoing an surgery on his ankle, manager Claudio Ranieri has said....

headline.main: Leicester's Mendy Out for Five Weeks, Says Ranieri
headline.print_headline: Leicester's Mendy Out for Five Weeks, Says Ranieri

lead_paragraph: Leicester City midfielder Nampalys Mendy will be out of action for around five weeks after undergoing an surgery on his ankle, manager Claudio Ranieri has said.
